snippet.title: Core Games - Official Early Access Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Core Early Access is here and available on the Epic Games Store for free at https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/core.  Join Kenton (voiced by WWE's Austin Creed) as he gains access to the Core multiverse. Play thousands of Unreal-powered games in every genre imaginable, or create, share, and earn from your own!

Thanks for watching! Comment, Like, Subscribe, and Share for more awesome Core game videos, updates, tutorials, and more! 

Check us out on:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/CoreGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CoreLive
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playcoregames/
Discord: https://discord.gg/85k8A7V

Core is an endless universe of games and worlds designed by a global community of creators. It's a radically accessible game construction kit, content exchange, and game-playing platform, all in one. With Core, you can create multiplayer games, using the power of Unreal Engine, with no coding or art skills required. When you're ready to share your creations, publish them to the Core platform where they'll be instantly available to play. Core has everything you need to bring your idea to life and reach millions of gamers - it’s your own personal game studio!

Check out some of the Core games and inspirations for this trailer:

Spellshock 2 by ManticoreGames
https://www.coregames.com/games/f8b143/spellshock-2
Horizon Survival by Kreation
https://www.coregames.com/games/4220f9/outpost-m-survival
EFU-CORE by MystAria
https://www.coregames.com/games/475b80/efu-core
Great Valley Railway by AquaFrost
https://www.coregames.com/games/a3994f/core-valley-railway
Strike Team by Manticore Games
https://www.coregames.com/games/9442a4/strike-team
Farmers Market by Manticore Games
https://www.coregames.com/games/67442e/farmers-market
Corehaven Chronicles by Manticore Games
https://www.coregames.com/games/a91218/corehaven
Survival Starter Kit by standardcombo
https://www.coregames.com/games/b9c49b/survival-framework
Minigolf by Divided
https://www.coregames.com/games/2f9ede/minigolf
The Taj Mahal by LaKwaai
https://www.coregames.com/games/cca5c5/the-taj-mahal

Core is free and in Early Access. Start creating and playing now!

Try Core today by signing up at https://coregames.com | Core API Documentation & Tutorials: https://docs.coregames.com | Core Creator Forums: https://forums.coregames.com

Written & Directed by Jason Getchell
Core Art & Design by Team Meta
Production by Layer Media
Executively Produced by Patrick Buechner
